titles.title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide certain qualifications pertaining to service as a Member, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 5/20/1993--Introduced. Amends the Rules of the House of Representatives to add a rule prohibiting a Member from serving any term or portion thereof if the Member has served for each of the five immediately preceding terms commencing after 1992. Requires a recorded vote to amend or repeal such rule.
